entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-07-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • EnC: handle removed documents #62848
  • Move Static Members refactoring with dialog fails when selecting members from partial class #62846
  • Rename `LifetimeAnnotationAttribute` to `ScopedRefAttribute` and remove unnecessary members #62838
    17.4
  • Remove tracking of unmatched `in` parameters in `GetInvocationEscapeScope()` and `CheckInvocationEscape()` #62834
  • Mono.Android.dll IL Size increase in .NET 7 Preview 7 & RC 1 #62832
  • IDE0075: GetCurrentNode returned null #62827
  • 'Change signature' preview reference changes doesn't work #62825
  • Change signature removes parameter I didn't select to be removed #62824
  • 'CSharpMoveStaticMembersRefactoringProvider' encountered an error and has been disabled #62823

Closed

  • API proposal: GeneratorDriver.ReplaceGenerators #62796
  • EnC: allow adding/removing await expressions in async method #54095
    17.4
  • EnC: allow adding a namespace declaration #51398
    17.3 P2
  • VB EnC rename tests are failing in CI #62844
  • Change the `LifetimeAnnotationAttribute` constructor signature to take a single value. #62734
    17.4
  • C# - support for op_Assign #62835
  • Bad parser behavior when combining `file`, `partial`, and `record` #62679
    17.4
  • `partial` check is in the parser because of initial problems moving it to binding #22439
    Backlog
  • SourceGenerator How to distinguish SyntaxNode generated by intelliCode #62820
  • Cannot cast to `nint` or `nuint` right after getting the address of a symbol #62798
  • EnC: member moves across partial definitions might be classified as renamed and not handled correctly #51011
    Backlog
  • Support ref field assignment in object initializers #62120
    17.4

PullRequests

Created

  • HasChangesAsync should return false if the document content did not changed #62849
    Area-Interactive
  • Remove unnecessary tracking of unmatched parameters in method invocation escape analysis #62847
    Area-Compilers
  • ci build cleanup #62845
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Simplify task management in inline-rename code. #62842
    Area-IDE
  • Add ChecksumAlgorithm to project snapshot #62840
    Area-IDE
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 1895883 #62839
  • Merge main to features/use-azure-build-machines #62829
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #62828
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Simplify `AbstractBuiltInCodeStyleDiagnosticAnalyzer` constructors #62826
    Area-IDE, Community
  • File types EE support #62812
    Area-Compilers
  • WIP: Not for review #62810
    Area-IDE
  • Merge main to features/cache-artifacts #62809
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Merge release/dev17.3 to main #62806
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts

Merged

  • Switch to immutable arrays from arrays in Rename OOP serialization #62841
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Use the prior cached state for the Razor generator in later runs #62219
    Area-IDE, Area-Compilers, Next
  • Move few tests to shared analyzers layer #62830
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Delete our SetCallstackIfEmpty helper #62811
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Fixes bad merge #62843
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Allow for Parsing Lambda Default Parameters #62782
    Area-Compilers
  • PR feedback on lightweight rename OOP work. #62803
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.3 to release/dev17.3-vs-deps #62836
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Fix GetNext/PreviousDirective's handling of duplicate trivia #62760
    Area-Compilers
  • Remove 'mangleName' parameter in PENamedTypeSymbolNonGeneric #62813
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Produce errors for 'partial file record' #62686
    Area-Compilers, Community, Next
  • Remove unused OptionDefinition.IsPerLanguage #62786
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • [EnC] Allow renaming methods, properties, events etc. #62364
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Move UseExpressionBodyForLambda to Analyzers layer #62675
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Merge main to features/use-azure-build-machines #62822
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Rename `IPerLanguageOption` and `ILanguageSpecificOption` and add LanguageName property #62766
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #62821
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to features/use-azure-build-machines #62819
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Support ref field assignment in object initializers #62584
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #62818
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Fix cref tags on generated VB's SyntaxFactory #62578
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #62807
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to features/use-azure-build-machines #62808
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • correctness build optimizations #62797
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add external access for unit test generation #62633
    Area-IDE
  • Support renaming multiple symbols in RenameLanguageService #62670
    Area-IDE
  • Merge IBC data for .Net core binaries #61424
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Document Outline Feature #61784
    Area-IDE
  • Remove unneeded 'using OptionSet = ...' #62769
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Support UnscopedRefAttribute #62783
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Implement IAttributeOperation #59369
    Area-Compilers, Community, Feature - IOperation
  • Block constant and relational pattern matching on types inheriting from or constrained to INumberBase<T> #62653
    Area-Compilers
  • Remove support for 'ref scoped' #62788
    Area-Compilers
  • `ref` parameters to `ref struct` types should be `scoped ref` by default #62778
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Fix semantic model to handle ParenthesizedVariableDesignation #54439
    Area-Compilers
  • Improve circularity analysis in bases for some scenarios. #62799
    Area-Compilers
  • Don't report diagnostics if code-style option is disabled #62497
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Improve SyntaxTree/Node.Dump() #62703
    Area-Compilers
  • ignore top level statements from move static member refactoring #61227
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Run suppressors insofar as there are suppressible errors #62641
    Area-Compilers
